SELECT p.prd_name, r.content, r.created_at, r.rating u.baumann_id FROM review r JOIN product p ON r.product_id = p.product_id JOIN user_table u on r.user_id = u.user_id WHERE r.user_id = #{user_id}
AND (p.prd_name LIKE '%', #{keyword}, '%' OR r.content LIKE '%', #{keyword}, '%')
AND r.rating >= #{filter_rating}
ORDER BY r.created_at DESC
ORDER BY r.created_at ASC
ORDER BY r.rating DESC
ORDER BY r.rating ASC
ORDER BY r.like_count DESC
ORDER BY r.created_at DESC
